Concatenate repgrid objects.

Source: R/repgrid-basicops.r
ops-methods.Rd

Simple concatenation of repgrid objects or list containing repgrid objects using the '+' operator.

Usage

# S4 method for repgrid,repgrid
+(e1, e2)

# S4 method for list,repgrid
+(e1, e2)

# S4 method for repgrid,list
+(e1, e2)

Arguments

e1, e2

A repgrid object.

Details

Methods for "+" function.

Examples


x <- bell2010
x + x
#>
